variable.name: breakpoint_mobile
variable.description: The maximum width of a device (in pixels) that is served the mobile layout. Devices with a width smaller than specified will see the mobile layout. Devices with a higher width will see the tablet or desktop layout.

variable.name: breakpoint_tablet
variable.description: The maximum width of a device (in pixels) that is served the tablet layout. Devices with a screen width between the Mobile phone maximum width and the Tablet maximum width will see the tablet layout. Devices with a higher width will see the desktop layout.

variable.name: body_font
variable.description: The font used in the layout. Changing this setting will affect the entire layout but will not change your topic content.

variable.name: body_bgcolor
variable.description: The background color of the page

variable.name: us_loading_image
variable.description: The image shown when loading a topic or other resource. Use an animated GIF for best effect.

variable.name: ftr_font_color
variable.description: The color of the footer text

variable.name: us_useIDX
variable.description: Do you want to show the index in the output?

variable.name: us_useGLO
variable.description: Do you want to show the Glossary in the output?

variable.name: us_useFilter
variable.description: Do you want to show the filter option in the output? Setting this to false will only hide the filter for the reader. You can still use the filter through a context sensitive help call. (If you enable dynamic filters in your output settings.)

variable.name: customlink_1_text
variable.description: The text for a custom link in the header/mobile menu. Leave at - Link text - to hide custom link.

variable.name: customlink_1_href
variable.description: The link target for a custom link in the header/mobile menu.

variable.name: customlink_2_text
variable.description: The text for a custom link in the header/mobile menu. Leave at - Link text - to hide custom link.

variable.name: customlink_2_href
variable.description: The link target for a custom link in the header/mobile menu.

variable.name: hdr_bgcolor
variable.description: The background color of the header

variable.name: hdr_font_color
variable.description: The color of the header font

variable.name: hdr_bread_font_color
variable.description: The color of the breadcrumb font

variable.name: hdr_logo
variable.description: The company logo displayed in the header (48 x 48px)

variable.name: hdr_nav_bgcolor
variable.description: The background color of the header navigation bar

variable.name: hdr_hamburger
variable.description: The icon used for the menu on mobile (18 x 18px)

variable.name: title_color
variable.description: The color of the main heading on the home page

variable.name: subtitle_color
variable.description: The color of the subtitle on the home page

variable.name: search_list_font_color
variable.description: The color of text displayed in the search suggestions on the home page

variable.name: search_list_bgcolor
variable.description: The background color of the search suggestions on the home page

variable.name: search_list_divider_color
variable.description: The color of the dividing line between search suggestions on the home page

variable.name: search_list_remove_icon
variable.description: The icon used for deleting search suggestions (12 x 12px)

variable.name: toc_grid_items
variable.uiname: Number of TOC tiles in a row
variable.description: The number of TOC items shown on a single row on the home page. Fewer items make for wider TOC buttons allowing more text and wider images.

variable.name: toc_item_color
variable.description: The background color of table of contents items on the home page

variable.name: toc_item_hover_color
variable.description: The color used when hovering over a table of contents item on the home page

variable.name: toc_book_icon
variable.description: The icon used for books in the TOC on the home page (64 x 64px)

variable.name: toc_book_icon_hover
variable.description: The icon used for books in the TOC on the home page when hovering (64 x 64px)

variable.name: toc_back_icon
variable.description: The image used to indicate the back up a level in TOC on the home page (64 x 64px)

variable.name: toc_back_icon_hover
variable.description: The image used to indicate the back up a level in TOC on the home page when hovering (64 x 64px)

variable.name: toc_topic_icon
variable.description: The icon used for topics in the TOC on the home page (64 x 64px)

variable.name: toc_topic_icon_hover
variable.description: The icon used for topics in the TOC on the home page when hovering (64 x 64px)

variable.name: toc_url_icon
variable.description: The icon used for remote URLs in the TOC on the home page (64 x 64px)

variable.name: toc_url_icon_hover
variable.description: The icon used for remote URLs in the TOC on the home page when hovering (64 x 64px)

variable.name: toc_item_label_bgcolor
variable.description: The background color of the text label associated with table of contents items on the home page

variable.name: toc_item_label_bgcolor_hover
variable.description: The background color of the text label associated with table of contents items on the home page when hovering

variable.name: toc_item_label_color
variable.description: The color of the text label for each table of contents item on the home page

variable.name: toc_item_label_color_hover
variable.description: The color of the text label for each table of contents item on the home page when hovering

variable.name: search_bgcolor
variable.description: The background color of the search field on the home page

variable.name: search_font_color
variable.description: The color of text typed into the search field on the home page

variable.name: search_icon
variable.description: The icon used for the search field on the home page (18 x 18px)

variable.name: function_btn_bgcolor
variable.description: The background color of the function buttons on the home page

variable.name: function_btn_font_color
variable.description: The font color of the function buttons on the home page

variable.name: function_btn_hover_color
variable.description: The background color used when the mouse is hovered over the function buttons on the home page

variable.name: function_btn_font_hover_color
variable.description: The font color used when the mouse is hovered over the function buttons on the home page

variable.name: filter_applied_image_home
variable.description: The image used to indicate that a filter has been applied (16 x 16px)

variable.name: us_custom_toc_icons
variable.description: Do you want to use custom TOC icons instead of generic book, link and topic icons? This only applies to the first level of the TOC on the homepage. The number applies to the item number in the TOC.

variable.name: us_custom_css
variable.description: CSS file to set the custom icons of your TOC. Use this instead of the options below if you want to control the TOC in CSS instead of through the editor. You can also use this custom CSS to change any other formatting in the layout. Note: After choosing a custom CSS file, you can no longer use the options below to apply custom TOC icons.

variable.name: topic_bgcolor
variable.description: The background color of the topic container

variable.name: browse_button_bgcolor
variable.description: The background color of the browse buttons

variable.name: browse_next_image
variable.description: The image used for the next browse button (16 x 16px)

variable.name: browse_next_hover_image
variable.description: The image used when the mouse is hovered over the next browse button (16 x 16px)

variable.name: browse_previous_image
variable.description: The image used for the previous browse button (16 x 16px)

variable.name: browse_previous_hover_image
variable.description: The image used when the mouse is hovered over the previous browse button (16 x 16px)

variable.name: favorite_image
variable.description: The image used for the favorite button (16 x 16px)

variable.name: favorite_hover_image
variable.description: The image used when the mouse is hovered over the favorite button (16 x 16px)

variable.name: favorite_add_image
variable.description: The image used for the add favorite button (16 x 16px)

variable.name: favorite_add_hover_image
variable.description: The image used when the mouse is hovered over the add favorite button (16 x 16px)

variable.name: favorite_added_image
variable.description: The image used to indicate a favorite has been added (16 x 16px)

variable.name: favorite_added_hover_image
variable.description: The image used when the mouse is hovered over the favorite has been button (16 x 16px)

variable.name: function_btn_bgcolor_topic
variable.description: The background color of the function buttons on the topic page

variable.name: function_btn_font_color_topic
variable.description: The font color of the function buttons on the topic page

variable.name: function_btn_hover_color_topic_hover
variable.description: The font color used when the mouse is hovered over the function buttons on the topic page

variable.name: function_btn_font_color_hover
variable.description: The font color of the function buttons when hovered on the topic page

variable.name: topic_toc_item_font_color
variable.description: The color of table of contents items in topics

variable.name: topic_toc_item_hover_color
variable.description: The color of table of contents items in topics when hovered

variable.name: topic_toc_item_selected_color
variable.description: The color of table of contents items in topics when selected

variable.name: topic_toc_item_selected_image
variable.description: The image used for the selected table of contents item in topics (16 x 16px)

variable.name: sidebar_bgcolor
variable.description: The background color of the sidebar

variable.name: sidebar_title_font_color
variable.description: The color of the sidebar title

variable.name: sidebar_item_font_color
variable.description: The color of the menu options in the sidebar

variable.name: sidebar_item_font_color_hover
variable.description: The color of the menu options when when hovered in the sidebar

variable.name: sidebar_close_icon
variable.description: The icon used for the close icon in the sidebar (16 x 16px)

variable.name: sidebar_close_icon_hover
variable.description: The icon used when the mouse is hovered over the close icon in the sidebar (16 x 16px)

variable.name: sidebar_footer_button_background
variable.description: The background color of buttons in the footer of the sidebar

variable.name: sidebar_footer_button_color
variable.description: The color of buttons in the footer of the sidebar

variable.name: sidebar_footer_button_color_hover
variable.description: The color of buttons in the footer of the sidebar

variable.name: sidebar_footer_button_background_hover
variable.description: The background color of buttons when hovered in the footer of the sidebar

variable.name: sidebar_separator_color
variable.description: The color of the dividing line between menu options in the sidebar

variable.name: mobile_toc_item_font_color
variable.description: The font color of contents items in the sidebar

variable.name: mobile_toc_item_hover_color
variable.description: The font color of contents items when hovered in the sidebar

variable.name: mobile_toc_item_selected_color
variable.description: The color of table of contents items in the sidebar when selected

variable.name: mobile_toc_item_drill_down_image
variable.uiname: Mobile TOC Item Drill Down Image
variable.description: The image used to indicate a submenu in the contents sidebar (16 x 16px)

variable.name: mobile_toc_item_drill_down_hover_image
variable.uiname: Mobile TOC Item Drill Down Hover Image
variable.description: The image used to when a submenu is hovered in the contents sidebar (16 x 16px)

variable.name: mobile_toc_item_back_image
variable.description: The image used to indicate the back up a level in the contents sidebar (16 x 16px)

variable.name: mobile_toc_item_back_hover_image
variable.uiname: Mobile TOC Item Back Hover Image
variable.description: The image used when the back up a level item is hovered in the contents sidebar (16 x 16px)

variable.name: tablet_toc_item_font_color
variable.description: The font color of contents items in the sidebar

variable.name: tablet_toc_item_hover_color
variable.description: The font color of contents items when hovered in the sidebar

variable.name: tablet_toc_item_selected_color
variable.description: The color of table of contents items in the sidebar when selected

variable.name: tablet_toc_item_selected_image
variable.description: The image used to indicate the selected contents item in the contents sidebar (16 x 16px)

variable.name: index_input_bgcolor
variable.description: The background color of the index input

variable.name: index_input_font_color
variable.description: The color of the font in the index input

variable.name: index_keyword_font_color
variable.description: The color of keywords in the index

variable.name: index_keyword_hover_color
variable.description: The font color displayed when the mouse is hovered over keywords in the index

variable.name: index_keyword_hover_bgcolor
variable.description: The background color displayed when the mouse is hovered over keywords in the index

variable.name: glossary_input_bgcolor
variable.description: The background color of the glossary input

variable.name: glossary_input_font_color
variable.description: The color of the font in the glossary input

variable.name: glossary_term_font_color
variable.description: The color of terms in the glossary

variable.name: glossary_term_hover_color
variable.description: The font color displayed when the mouse is hovered over terms in the glossary

variable.name: glossary_term_hover_bgcolor
variable.description: The background color displayed when the mouse is hovered over terms in the glossary

variable.name: glossary_definition_font_color
variable.description: The color of definitions in the glossary

variable.name: search_input_bgcolor
variable.description: The background color of the search input

variable.name: search_input_font_color
variable.description: The color of the font in the search input

variable.name: search_list_font_color_sidebar
variable.description: The color of text displayed in the search suggestions in the sidebar

variable.name: search_list_bgcolor_sidebar
variable.description: The background color of the search suggestions in the sidebar

variable.name: search_list_divider_color_sidebar
variable.description: The color of the dividing line between search suggestions in the sidebar

variable.name: search_list_item_hover_color_sidebar
variable.description: The font color used when the mouse is hovered over search suggestions in the sidebar

variable.name: search_options_font_color
variable.description: The color of the search options in the sidebar

variable.name: search_input_icon
variable.description: The icon used for the search field in the sidebar (18 x 18px)

variable.name: search_check_box_image
variable.description: The image used for check boxes in the search options (16 x 16px)

variable.name: search_check_box_selected_image
variable.description: The image used for selected check boxes in the search options (16 x 16px)

variable.name: search_message_font_color
variable.description: The font color of the message displayed after a search has been performed

variable.name: search_message_border_color
variable.description: The color of the border under the search message

variable.name: search_results_title_font_color
variable.description: The color of the search result titles

variable.name: search_results_context_font_color
variable.description: The color of the search result context description

variable.name: search_results_URL_font_color
variable.description: The color of the search result URLs

variable.name: search_results_end_font_color
variable.description: The color of the message that appears at the end of search results

variable.name: search_results_topic_icon
variable.description: The image used to indicate topics in the search results (16 x 16px)

variable.name: search_results_document_icon
variable.description: The image used to indicate documents in the search results (16 x 16px)

variable.name: search_results_presentation_icon
variable.description: The image used to indicate presentations in the search results (16 x 16px)

variable.name: search_results_spreadsheet_icon
variable.description: The image used to indicate spreadsheets in the search results (16 x 16px)

variable.name: search_results_text_file_icon
variable.description: The image used to indicate text files in the search results (16 x 16px)

variable.name: search_results_pdf_icon
variable.description: The image used to indicate PDFs in the search results (16 x 16px)

variable.name: filter_applied_image
variable.description: The image used to indicate that a filter has been applied (16 x 16px)

variable.name: filter_reset_button_bgcolor
variable.description: The background color of the filter reset button

variable.name: filter_reset_button_font_color
variable.description: The font color of the filter reset button

variable.name: filter_reset_button_font_hover_color
variable.uiname: Filter Reset Button Font Hover Color
variable.description: The font color of the reset button when hovered in the sidebar

variable.name: filter_reset_button_hover_bgcolor
variable.uiname: Filter Reset Button Background Hover Color
variable.description: The background color of the reset button when hovered in the sidebar

variable.name: filter_label_font_color
variable.description: The font color of filter labels, i.e. subheadings

variable.name: filter_label_border_color
variable.description: The font color of the filter label border

variable.name: filter_item_font_color
variable.description: The font color of the filter options

variable.name: filter_check_box_image
variable.description: The image used for check boxes in the filter options (16 x 16px)

variable.name: filter_check_box_selected_image
variable.description: The image used for selected check boxes in the filter options (16 x 16px)

variable.name: filter_radio_button_image
variable.description: The image used for radio buttons in the filter options (16 x 16px)

variable.name: filter_radio_button_selected_image
variable.description: The image used for selected radio buttons in the filter options (16 x 16px)

variable.name: favorite_text_font_color
variable.description: The color of text in the list of favorites

variable.name: favorite_text_hover_bgcolor
variable.description: The background color displayed when the mouse is hovered over text in the list of favorites

variable.name: favorite_delete_button_image
variable.description: The image used for the remove icon in the favorites overlay (16 x 16px)

variable.name: favorite_delete_button_hover_image
variable.description: The image used when the mouse is hovered over the remove favorite icon (16 x 16px)

variable.name: favorite_label_font_color
variable.description: The font color of favorite label, i.e. subheadings

variable.name: favorite_label_border_color
variable.description: The font color of the favorite label border
